rakawaranaya patha oostreliyawata giya shri lankikayeku oostreliyawe saranagathabhawaya prathikshepa kota yali shri lankawata paminimata thiranayakara atha.oostreliyawata giya me shri lankikaya krismas dupathe randawa sita athi athara pasuwa nawuru bala ragena yamata uthsaha ganimath samanga saranagathabhawaya prathikshepa kala bawada elesa saranagathabhawaya prathikshepa kala palamu wideshikaya mohu bawada wartha weyi.krismas dupathe randawa siti shri lankikayan 18 deneku nawuru bala ragena yamata oostreliyanu rajaya piyawara ganimath samanga me pudgalaya ema kandawura wetha nogos yali shri lankawata paminimata thiranayakara thibe.nithi wirodhi ayurin oostreliyawata athuluwana wideshikayin nawuru dupathata ragena yamata erata rajaya pasugiyada thiranaya karana lada athara ehi prathipalayak washayen shri lankikayanda ema dupatha wetha ragena yamata piyawara gena thibe.

blogkaranaya pilambaanda ho wenayam kalakirimak nisa ho blogkaranaya hara wenath mawathakata piwisima nisa ho mewan deyak siduwiya haka.peramun rala ge atuwawa natharakara damuwe melesaya.eya nathara kirimata pera awasana postuwak magin patakayata danumdimak da kala athaeeta labuna prathichara walata kathuwaraya wisin pilithuru bandima da siduwiya.esema awashya patakayekuta blogaye lipi baganimata da awakashaya laba di eya awasan gaman giyeya.meya bohodurata salasum sahagatha kriyawak misa ahambayak nowe.
